FuncDef: This command configures the type of clock. The clock-type can only be changed when PTP is shutdown.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the system is a boundary clock, which may be anywhere in the master-slave clock hierarchy. It can obtain timing from a master clock, and provide timing to multiple slave clocks concurrently.
Specifies that the system is a grandmaster clock in the master-slave hierarchy. The system provides timing to multiple slave clocks in the network.
Specifies that the system is always a slave clock in the master-slave hierarchy. The system derives its timing from one or more master clocks in the network.
